text.text: Normally, metalminds will store an identity, limiting who can fill or drain the power. By storing your identity in a metalmind, other metalminds you create will be unkeyed. You must have no identity to fill an unkeyed metalmind, but anyone with the proper power can tap them.
Identity metalminds can be used regardless of your ferring powers. Tapping identity from a metalmind changes your identity, letting you fill and drain metalminds belonging to your new identity.
